question:
Last week you were on a flight to London. Unfortunately, when you left the plane, you left a bag. You did not remember about the bag until you got to your hotel.
Write a letter to the airline. In your letter

explain what has happened
describe the bag and its content
and say what you would like them to do about it.
text: I am writing to seek your help in finding a bag I forgot at your airport. I boarded Warwick, plane number rc3105 from London to Leicester on the 1st of January which was last friday.

Before I boarded the plane, i received a call from my family that my cousin was involved in a ghastly accident and had already been rush down to the hospital. This information troubled my heart si much to the extent of forgetting my hand luggage.

The bag is made with leather, black in colour and square in shape. It has the designer  ame 'DIOR' printed on the front part. It contains my national identification card, samsung phone charger and my PhD dissertation.
I would be grateful if you could help me send the bag via courier service if found. Could you please send the cost of incurred during the process?. I appreciate your assistance in this matter.
